strategy: Word Bearer armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: The Word Bearers Retinue and all Word Bearers Elite formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Word Bearers, using their preferred operational methods.

sections.name: Word Bearers Core Formations
sections.description: Up to two Cultist Hosts may be taken per Word Bearer Retinue.

formations.name: Word Bearers Retinue
formations.units: One Word Bearer Coryphaus, six Chaos Space Marines, Daemonic Pact

formations.name: Cultist Host
formations.units: One Word Bearer Coryphaus, ten Cultists, Daemonic Pact
extraUnits: Replace up to two Cultists with Chaos Spawn: 25 points each
Replace up to four Cultists with Chaos Hounds: Free
Add enough Land Transporters to transport the formation with no space left over: 10 points each

sections.name: Word Bearers Elite Formations
sections.description: Up to one Elite formation may be taken per Word Bearers Retinue.

formations.name: Iconoclasts
formations.units: One Word Bearer Coryphaus, four Word Bearers Iconoclasts, Daemonic Pact

formations.name: Havocs
formations.units: One Word Bearer Coryphaus, four Havocs, two Chaos Rhinos, Daemonic Pact
extraUnits: Replace two Havocs with two Word Bearers Possessed: Free
Replace two Chaos Rhinos with Chaos Land Raiders, two Chaos Dreadnoughts: 75 points

formations.name: Armoured Company
extraUnits: Replace four Chaos Predators with four Chaos Land Raiders: 75 points

formations.name: The Anointed
formations.units: One Word Bearer Coryphaus, three Chaos Terminators, three Chaos Land Raiders, Daemonic Pact
extraUnits: Replace one Chaos Terminators unit with two Word Bearers Possessed: Free
Replace three Chaos Land Raiders with three Chaos Dreadnoughts: Free

sections.name: Daemon Engine Formations
sections.description: Up to one Daemon Engine formation may be taken per Cultist Host formation.

sections.name: War Engines & Chaos Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points. Add one for each Daemonic Pact in the army.

formations.name: Greater Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Greater Daemon Pool points.

upgrades.title: Word Bearers Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Battleship
items.description: Replace the Devastation Class Cruiser with a Despoiler Class Battleship

options.description: Add a Dark Apostle to the formation
Add a Daemon Prince unit to the formation
Add up to three Chaos Rhinos
Add up to three Chaos Land Raiders
(No more than needed to transport the formation with no space left over)

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to three Chaos Dreadnoughts

items.name: Predators
items.description: Add up to two Chaos Predators

items.name: Havocs
items.description: Replace two Chaos Space Marines with two Havocs

items.name: Possessed
items.description: Replace two Chaos Space Marines with two Word Bearers Possessed
